name: Waste Connections, Inc.
description: Waste Connections, Inc. is a leading provider of integrated waste management services in North America. Established in 1997, the company focuses on solid waste collection, transfer, disposal, and recycling services, providing environmentally responsible solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial customers. Waste Connections operates across 41 states and 6 provinces in Canada, serving millions of customers and emphasizing sustainability and innovation within the waste management industry. The company is dedicated to minimizing landfill waste and promoting recycling and resource recovery. Its operations include a vast network of landfills, recycling facilities, and transfer stations, all designed to enhance efficiency and reduce environmental impact. Waste Connections also places a strong emphasis on safety and compliance, ensuring that its operations meet or exceed regulatory requirements while maintaining high service quality. The company's commitment to corporate social responsibility extends to community engagement and environmental stewardship, making it a trusted partner in waste management solutions. As the demand for efficient waste management grows, Waste Connections continues to expand its services and capabilities, positioning itself as a leader in the industry.
